summary: Chris Kody, the world's best mercenary, is freed from prison -- but there's a catch. Kody must use his lethal weapons and fighting skills to stop a group of terrorists who have taken over a nuclear sub.
cast: Steven Seagal|Christine Adams|William Hope|Nick Brimble|Vinnie Jones|Alison King|P.H. title: Bajo control
